original_text: Also, because I am in a prison, most of the other believers here trust the Lord even more. The Lord has made them brave, so that they are not afraid to speak God's message to people.
korean_text: 형제 중 다수가 나의 매임으로 말미암아 주 안에서 신뢰함으로 겁 없이 하나님의 말씀을 더욱 담대히 전하게 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: Also, because I am in a prison
most of the other believers here trust the Lord even more
sentences.korean_translation: 여기 대부분의 다른 신자들은 주님을 더욱 신뢰합니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has made them brave
so that they are not afraid
to speak God's message to people
